firstNightReminder: Show the hand signal for the number of Outsiders in play.
name: Patrician
ability: You start knowing how many Outsiders are in play. [+1 Censor or -1 Outsider]

firstNightReminder: Show each token and head signal (nod yes, shake no) for whether each is in play.
otherNightReminder: If changed, show each token and head signal (nod yes, shake no) for whether each is in play.
name: Scholar
ability: You start knowing two not-in-play evil characters and learn if this changes.

name: Augur
ability: Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to guess one player's character and are told yes or no.

firstNightReminder: The Censor points to two players. Show the hand signal for how many of those players are Townsfolk.
otherNightReminder: The Censor points to two players. Show the hand signal for how many of those players are Townsfolk.
name: Censor
ability: Each night, choose 2 players (not yourself): you learn how many of them are townsfolk.

firstNightReminder: The Physician points to a player. Mark that player as protected.
otherNightReminder: The Physician points to a player. Mark that player as protected.
name: Physician
ability: Each night, choose a player. They are unaffected by drunk/poison status until dusk.

firstNightReminder: The Pontiff points to an Outsider or Minion character on the sheet. If that character is in the game, they are drunk until dusk. If they're evil, wake them, show them the Pontiff token and point to the Pontiff.
otherNightReminder: The Pontiff points to an Outsider or Minion character on the sheet. If that character is in the game, they are drunk until dusk. If they're evil, wake them, show them the Pontiff token and point to the Pontiff.
name: Pontiff
ability: Each night, choose an Outsider or Minion (different to last night): they are drunk until dusk and if they are evil, they learn who you are.

name: Polymath
ability: Each night, gain a Townsfolk ability until dusk. You learn this and wake after they would normally wake.

otherNightReminder: If the Advocate was nominated, show them the charater token of the player who nominated them.
name: Advocate
ability: Each night*, learn the character of the player who nominated you today.

otherNightReminder: If the Delator nominated a player and they died by execution, wake them and they shows the head signal for yes/no.  If yes, show the character token of the player who died.  They against show the head signal for yes/no.  If yes, the player is alive.
name: Delator
ability: Once per game, at night*, if you nominated a player today who died by execution, you may learn their character and then choose to bring them back to life.

otherNightReminder: Show a dead player the Mortician character token and point to the player who is the Mortician.
name: Mortician
ability: Each night*, a dead player learns you are the Mortician.

otherNightReminder: Show the hand signal for the number of evil players who nominated today. (Remove Nominated, tokens if any)
name: Scribe
ability: Each night*, learn how many evil players nominated today.

name: Herald
ability: When you nominate a player you may publicly state a Townsfolk: if they are that Townsfolk, they cannot die by execution today.

name: Envoy
ability: If you are nominated by a player who is not your alignment, you do not die if executed by vote today.

name: Barfly
ability: If you are nominated by another good player, they become drunk until another player nominates you. If you nominate yourself, a good player becomes drunk until another player nominates you.

otherNightReminder: If The Blowhard did not nominate a player today, their team loses. (Remove the Nomianted token, if any)
name: Blowhard
ability: Each night*, if you did not nominate another living player today, your team loses.

otherNightReminder: If the Courier died as the result of en evil player's nomination or ability, show that player the grimoire.
name: Courier
ability: When you die, if the player who nominated or killed you with their ability was evil, they may look at the grimoire tonight and choose a player to be drunk.

otherNightReminder: If the Nephilim died, the Demon may indicate No with their head or point to a Demon on the sheet to become. Show the Demon the You Are token with the chosen character.
name: Nephilim
ability: When you die, the demon may choose to become a different demon tonight.

firstNightReminder: The Mimic points at a good character on the sheet. If that character is in play, place the Mimicing token next to them. If not, swap the Mimic's token with it and place the Is Mimic token by the Mimic.
otherNightReminder: The Mimic points at a good character on the sheet. If that character is in play, place the Mimicing token next to them. If not, swap the Mimic's token with it and place the Is Mimic token by the Mimic.
name: Mimic
ability: Each night, choose a Townsfolk or Outsider and gain their ability until another is chosen. If that character is in play, they are poisoned until another is chosen.

otherNightReminder: Harpy points to a player.  If that player did not nominate today, put a Twisted token next to them.  Remove all Nominated reminder tokens.
name: Harpy
ability: Each night*, choose a player.  If they did not nominate today, they become twisted.  Twisted register as Evil & as a Demon for Townsfolk abilities. If all other living players are Twisted, your team wins. 1 good player knows a Harpy is in play.

name: Tormentor
ability: If any player is mad about being an Outsider, they might die tonight. [+1 Outsider]

otherNightReminder: If no other player was executed today, the Poltergeister points to a player and they die.  Remove any Executed reminder tokens
name: Poltergeist
ability: Each night*, even if you are dead, if no other player was executed today, choose a player: they die.

otherNightReminder: Sleeper agent points to a player, they die, and remove the Infiltrating token.  If the Sleeper Agent gives 'No' head signal instead, place the Infiltrating token by them.
name: Sleeper Agent
ability: Each night*, you may choose a player: they die. On your first night and each night you choose no-one, you register as, and have the ability of a not-in-play Townsfolk until you choose a player.  You start knowing this Townsfolk.

otherNightReminder: Silvertongue points to a player and they die. If they nominated a player today, they point to a second player who dies. (Remove the nominated token if any.)
name: Silvertongue
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you nominated a player today, choose a second player, they die.

firstNightReminder: Bane points to a player and they are poisoned.
otherNightReminder: Bane points to a player and they die. If that player was drunk or poisoned, one of their good Townsfolk neighbors becomes poisoned.
name: Bane
ability: First night only, choose a player: they are poisoned. Each night*, choose a player, they die. If you chose a player who is drunk or poisoned, one of their good Townsfolk neighbors become poisoned.

otherNightReminder: Xixu points to a player and they die.
name: Xixu
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You might register as a Good & as an Outsider. Outsiders might register as Evil & as a Demon. [+1 Outsider]

name: Ambassador
ability: Your votes count twice.

name: President
ability: Once per game, you may publicly pardon a player. If you do, they cannot be executed today.

otherNightReminder: Psychic points at a dead player. Immediately after the Psychic goes to sleep, wake that player and show them the Psychic token. (Place the Channeling token next to the player.)
name: Psychic
ability: Each night*: Choose a dead player. That player may vote without having or spending a token.

otherNightReminder: The Snoop either shows a 'No' head signal or points at a player. If the character is the same alignment as the Snoop, show the character token to the Snoop. If it was the first time the Snoop pointed at a player, place the Once token next to them. If it's the second time, they die and remove the Once token.
name: Snoop
ability: Snoop: Each night*, you may choose a player. If they are your alignment, learn their character. If you do this a second time, you die.
